Notes.Text:
This update for dovecot22 fixes one issue.

This security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2017-15132: An abort of SASL authentication resulted in a memory leak in
  dovecot's auth client used by login processes. The leak has impact in high
  performance configuration where same login processes are reused and can cause
  the process to crash due to memory exhaustion (bsc#1075608).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in dovecot 2.0 up to 2.2.33 and 2.3.0. An abort of SASL authentication results in a memory leak in dovecot's auth client used by login processes. The leak has impact in high performance configuration where same login processes are reused and can cause the process to crash due to memory exhaustion.
